timeline.bodyText: Rename to testFlushBufferWhenCheckpoint to make the test purpose more explicitly.
timeline.author: wuchong

timeline.message:
[FLINK-20552][jdbc] JdbcDynamicTableSink doesn't sink buffered data on checkpoint

This closes #14387
